T02D3100:191a-0: @191a * // lha mo gdugs dkar mo'i mngon spyod kyi cho ga byed par 'dod pas /
T02D3100:191a-1: nad dang gdon la sogs pa dang por sa gzhi yang gdub cing gas pa dang /
T02D3100:191a-2: rtsub pa la thab khung zur gsum ngos re la
T02D3100:191a-3: khru re yod pa la zabs su khru phyed pa
T02D3100:191a-4: bya ste / dbus su 'khor lo la rdo rjes mchan ba /
T02D3100:191a-5: kha yang rdo rjes bskor ba /
T02D3100:191a-6: sa gzhi yang dug dang khrag la sogs pa nag por byugs te /
T02D3100:191a-7: me tog nag po dang 'bru nag pos gtor ro //
T02D3100:191a-8: de nas drag po'i mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams la /
T02D3100:191a-9: drag po'i rdzas khrag dang dug dang lingga dang /
T02D3100:191a-15: bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor byas la thab dang rdzas rnams stong par bsams te /
T02D3100:191a-16: dzam las thab khung gru gsum pa bskyed pa'i nang du /
T02D3100:191a-17: cho ga gsum gyis gdugs dkar mo 'khor dang bcas pa drag po'i lhar bskyed par bya'o //
T02D3100:191a-18: de'i mdun gyi nam mkha' la ye shes sems dpa'
T02D3100:191a-19: 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te bzhugs su gsol
T02D3100:191a-20: nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te /
T02D3100:191a-21: sreg rdzas rnams yum gyi sngags kyi tha mar m'a ra ya btags te /
T02D3100:191a-22: khrag dang dug la sogs pas lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3100:191a-23: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la bzod par gsol ba la sogs pa rnams bya'o //
T02D3100:191a-24: de nas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs pa dang /
T02D3100:191b-0: dam tshig sems dpa' bsdus nas @191b rang nyid la bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D3100:191b-1: de lta bu de yang gang zhig tshar mchod kyi
T02D3100:191b-2: bar du lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gi
